text: @SethAbramson I really feel it's time too shut down this pathological liar, and an idiot of a president Trump. He doesn't know a dame thing about the coronavirus. When this all over he will have 2 million deaths on his hands. He is worse than Hitler, and Stalin put together. Trump is a traitor
